amendment.description: Amendment sought to modify the allocation of funds from the affordable housing fund in order to provide 10 percent of such funds in the first year to Texas.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 34 printed in the Congressional Record to redistribute the affordable housing grants for use in disaster areas from a ratio of 75% for Louisiana and 25% for Mississippi to create 10% for Texas by taking 5% each from the allotment for Louisiana and Mississippi.
